text_block_list.text: Okay peeps, It's time for an o-n-s-e-n trip!
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text: Out of nowhere, huh? Although I'm not one to talk. But this is pretty rare for you, Maruzen.
text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.

text_block_list.text: You think? We've been putting the pedal to the metal in practice for so long now! Plus, it's been so cold lately, we deserve a chance to warm up.
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: 'Kay, let's have fun today! C'mon, Ardan-chan, we're going to get some of those onsen manjuu over there!
Oh… of course! I'll gladly accompany you.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Oh, C.B.! I was just wondering where the heck you wandered off too… wait a sec, aren't your cheeks lookin' kinda red?

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
They've got a footbath over there, and I just tried it out. 
It felt sooo good!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: C'mon, no fair you got a head start! Show me where it is and then we'll get in together! You're comin' too, yeah Rudolf?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Haha… Of course I'll come along. My feet were just beginning to get cold from standing out here.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Those steam baths were gnarly! Did you see the bubbling water? Talk about impressive!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Perhaps it was due to the heat, but it was quite the surprise to see those cats clamoring nearby. …C.B., you haven't got any hidden in your coat anymore, do you?

'Tis a shame, but no. Hehe, maybe I should've 
let them hang out in there a little longer.
text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Woa-ho, this room is sick! It's like the view jumped straight outta a painting! And the cold air from the window's so refreshing, I can't get enough.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: It is indeed magnificently vast. It is no overstatement to say that it implores indolence. I often partook in games of chess with my grandfather in an inn room just like this…
Heheh, just leave it to ol' Maruzen! I can… not play chess, but how about a board game with everyone instead?
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text: And so, night fell at the onsen…
Whew, that was a nice bath… but it looks like Ardan-chan got out before us. I hope she's taking some time to rest.
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text:
So you did plan this with her wellbeing in mind. 
I ought to be grateful for your benevolence, Maruzensky.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Oh c'mon now, no need for all that bombastic praise. 
Plus, isn't it a little late for that?

We've been partners-in-crime since the start, 
haven't we? The two of us. ♪
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Heh… you're right. Yes, that's absolutely right.

Oh… you and I, plus C.B.-chan, Ace-chan, and Ramonu-chan… 
a performance with the five of us, huh?
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text: Indeed. A stupendously spellbinding performance that will grant Umamusume the verve to keep on running into the new year, carved cirumspect into the annals of history.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text: So basically, you wanna cheer everyone on with an epic calligraphy performance? Hmm, I think I'm picking up what you're putting down…
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: But, uh, how do I put this… don't you think the members you picked out are a little too strong?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Hm. The Emperor. The Supercar. The unconventional Triple Crown Umamusume. The world-reigning ace. And history's first Triple Tiara winner…
Perhaps you're perturbed by the fact that we may end up crushing their spirits rather than lifting them.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Gosh, you saw right through me! 
But if you already knew as much, then why…?

Because that's not all there is to it. 
Somebody once told me as much.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text: Even in the face of overwhelming might, a radiance as bright as the Northern Lights… there will always be someone out there who uses that as fuel to go even further.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text: I'm sure you already know what I mean, Maruzensky.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text: As such, I want to shine brightly, brighter than I ever have before, and illuminate all of the Umamusume who look up to us.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text: I won't be satisfied with just burning the sight into their minds. No, I want to shine so brightly that they cannot help but long to reach out for it.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf

text_block_list.text: Well, I've heard that sometimes light just throws shadows into even sharper relief. But you're saying you want to shine bright enough to make the shadows hightail, too?
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text:
That's right. With the four of you, 
I'm confident we can do it.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Ahahaha! Oh, you and that unshakable confidence!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: But… yeah, sure, count me in! No, not just me, we're gonna hit a grand slam with everyone!

Let's do it, together! We'll light all our 
underclassmen up with a shine no one's seen before!
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
True enough… to be honest, I think 
we're asking quite a lot of Ardan.
But… I think it'll be okay, just like you were saying before. The light might blind her at first, but I'm sure…
text_block_list.name: Maruzensky

text_block_list.text: Whew! That ping-pong match with C.B. sure got heated…
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text:
Wait, woah, woah, Ardan?! 
You brought all your calligraphy stuff?!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: A-ah, no, this is just, um…

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Jeez… didn't Maruzen tell you this was for us to take a break? Takin' it slow is important too, y'know!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: I'm very grateful for all your concern. But you see, I'm not like you all. I'm always… one step behind.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: In this state, I'll never be able to fill my sister's shoes. So if you could just act as if you didn't—

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Hmm…
Aight, how about we change and head outside, then? If you keep practicin' in here, the others'll find us out.
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: Huh… um, Ace-san?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Whew, it's cold as balls out here! Okay, now where's a good place to practice…? We gotta find someplace before we end up freezin'.
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: U-um…! Forgive me— it's only I who lacks practice… there's no need for you to go out of your way to—
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: I'm telling ya: It's all good. I managed to sync up with C.B. earlier, but I was still trippin' over myself for a good bit, too.
When C.B. takes a crack at something, she always lands on her feet! Geez, the awesome really are awesome.
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: That's… if we were to say such, then I believe it is you, Ace-san, who is incredible. You neither lose heart nor surrender, and continue practicing over and over…
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan

text_block_list.text: Thanks.
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: I'll send those words right back your way.
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: The awesome are awesome. Nothin' wrong about that.
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace

text_block_list.text: But y'know, the thing about that is that it ain't a reason to think any less of yourself.
text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
